column1: The Pit Room////Good food. My friends and I all bought one meat and shared a bit among four of us. The turkey and the jalape√±o cheddar sausage were my favorites. They also had iced coffee by their fountain drinks
column2: never seen that before but I gladly took one to go. The only thing I did not like is that there were flies everywhere
column3: not enough to ruin my meal but enough to notice. I'd recommend coming here
column4: just sit away from the doors to avoid the flies.
